Html:
Hi people. I am new to proj.net. I faced with a problem. I need to convert coordinates from my shapefile in WGS84 to EPGS:900913.

I want to know.

What should i download?, which programs should i use(i use MapWindowGIS as my Map Viewer)?,

I am also a silverlight developer and i have seen this code here: http://projnet.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=77458

Can it help me, if so what should i use it for?

Above all, how should i get my coordinates to EPGS:900913?

 

Regards

EPSG has never defined a 900913 code.

You ask what you need to download. Either download the dll's and/or the source under the downloads tab
Ok. SharpGIS i meant the VE/Google Maps Mercator projection.
